mapper.sql: id, server_addr, db_name, tbs_name, disk_group, db_port, inst_name, db_type, active, total, total_mb, used_mb, used_percent, data_type, alarm_level, active_level1_threshold, active_level2_threshold, total_level1_threshold, total_level2_threshold, level1_threshold, level2_threshold, alarm_time, create_time, update_time, alarm_reason
mapper.insert: insert into gm_threshold_config (id, server_addr, db_name, tbs_name, disk_group, db_port, inst_name, db_type, active, total, total_mb, used_mb, used_percent, data_type, alarm_level, active_level1_threshold, active_level2_threshold, total_level1_threshold, total_level2_threshold, level1_threshold, level2_threshold, alarm_time, create_time, update_time, alarm_reason) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{serverAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diskGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbPort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{instName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalMB,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{usedMB,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{usedPercent,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeLevel1Threshold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{activeLevel2Threshold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalLevel1Threshold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalLevel2Threshold,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level1Threshold,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{level2Threshold,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{alarmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmReason,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select:
select
from gm_threshold_config where data_type = #{dataType} and alarm_level != 0 order by active desc limit 0,5

select
from gm_threshold_config where data_type = #{dataType} and alarm_level != 0 order by used_percent desc limit 0,5
